item.title: On the Subject of E-Mails
item.description: First off, I would like to apologize to those individuals who e-mailed me while I was absent and who didn't get a response. I stated that I would reply to every e-mail I got and this wasn't the case. I'm sorry. Second, I'm still accepting e-mails. I would love for people to send me stats for things like the Golden Axe or Golden Shield, or even monsters I don't have. Lastly, I received a question through e-mail that went unanswered. The sender asks "How do you take a picture of the shield without having the weapon block it?". When you attack with the Golden Plate the animation first drops the shield where you were standing then leaps at the opponent. If you get rid of your pet you can take an unobstructed screenshot of the shield. Crop it and voila! It works very well on the snowy background where Snow Bunnyzards are fought.

item.title: The Revamp Continues
item.description: I've remove all subjective information from the encyclopedia. The opinions belong in a guide, not on the encyclopedia articles. Also, if there was a stat that the game didn't specify or make completely obvious it was removed from the entries too. I still haven't figured out a good way to deal with weapon special rates, weapon special damage, and the likes. I'm all open to suggestions.
